title: Fix update post button not working
scope: Investigate and fix the update post button behavior in the blog/admin UI.
Ensure update actions persist and the UI reflects success/failure states.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking the Update Post button updates the post and shows a success state.
Errors are surfaced to the user if the update fails.
No regression in create or delete post flows.
risk_notes: Possible mismatch between frontend payload shape and backend expectations.
Async state handling could mask request failures.
rollback_plan: Revert backend update endpoint changes if modified.
